pages.text: $(5)$(o)Teamwork makes the dreamwork.$() $(br2)If you want to co-operate with your friends, you can join a team and work together!$(br2)$(6)FTB Team$() FTB teammates sync their quest progress and territories. To create or join an FTB team, Open your inventory and click on 'My Team' button on the top left.

$(2)TogetherForever Team$() TogetherForever teammates sync their game stages and advancements. Use the command $(5)/togetherforever$() to manage this team system. $(2)/togetherforever invite$() invites a player into your team, $(2)/togetherforever leave$() makes you leave your current team. Use $(2)/togetherforever accept$() to accept an invite request. Use $(2)/togetherforever forcesync$() to force sync progress between teammates.
